mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.refer_id AS "referId", a.refer_type AS "referType", a.auditer_id AS "auditerId", a.auditer_name AS "auditerName", a.audite_time AS "auditeTime", a.is_agreed AS "isAgreed", a.refuse_reson AS "refuseReson", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_audite_log( id, refer_id, refer_type, auditer_id, auditer_name, audite_time, is_agreed, refuse_reson, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{referId}, #{referType}, #{auditerId}, #{auditerName}, #{auditeTime}, #{isAgreed}, #{refuseReson}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_audite_log SET refer_id = #{referId}, refer_type = #{referType}, auditer_id = #{auditerId}, auditer_name = #{auditerName}, audite_time = #{auditeTime}, is_agreed = #{isAgreed}, refuse_reson = #{refuseReson}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
